attributes.action: keep our homes out of Inheritance Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The main reason that Inheritance Tax is unfair is because of the rise in house prices that has caused ordinary people to be caught in a tax`trap always meant for the very rich.  Taking the deceased's prime residence out of the value of the inherited estate would even up the playing field.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
